root.name: Bushido
root.description: Though there is no clear story in Bushido: The Way of the Warrior, the player visits three locations inside and outside of a dojo where a variety of enemies must be battled.The enemies include:Sword-wielding samuraiShuriken-throwing ninjasCrawling snakesLocations visited are:Outside the dojoInside the dojoThe dojo cellarsThe player character, a kung-fu master, is controlled using the keyboard. Various kicks and punches can be delivered by using the 9-key cursor commonly found on keyboards at the time.
